about_the_game:
Wanted 3D - a retro Spaghetti Western FPS that will make you feel nostalgic for the classics!

In the plains of the Wild West, a group of outlaws acquired a trove of gold. But greed blinded them, and they had no intention of sharing with the novice of the group - in other words, you. After falling victim to a trap, you were captured and handed over to the authorities while the backstabbers kept your cut of the profits.

Left to rot in a dingy New Mexico prison, your mind harbored only rage and hatred. Meanwhile, they have been recruiting countless bloodthirsty bandits and hired guns to ransack the land of all its riches. Years later, a riot breaks out, and you are able to escape your cell. Grabbing a firearm and cursing the names of the scum who betrayed you all those years ago, you vow to strike fear in their hearts as... the Nameless Rider!

                 

Game Features:

  • Bandit-blasting, key-hunting, secret-plundering, boomer shooter action powered by the expansive GZDoom engine

  • 14 expansive levels to explore, ranging from a dangerous mine to a town under siege

  • 11+ relentless outlaws armed with guns and bombs galore

  • 7 classic Western weapons, ranging from a scoped lever-action rifle to deadly TNT

  • 3 boss battles against your former comrades

  • Badass one-liners and pop culture references galore

short_description: Grab your bandolier and saddle up for Wanted 3D, a GZDoom-powered Spaghetti Western FPS! It's time to settle the score with your former gang and reclaim what is rightfully yours. Are you ready for the wildest showdown the Wild West has to offer?
